page.title: 04'A DAY IN THE LIFE'
page.content:
Mrs Copsie lives in Thorpe Willoughby, she is in her mid thirties. She gets up a 7.00 a.m. and has cereal for breakfast. She does not go to work. In her spare time she enjoys reading, swimming and walking. She goes to bed at ll.00 p.m. She has been married for l8 years. Her husband works as a Company Manager. In his spare time he is a rugby referee; he also likes reading.
They have two children - both girls; one is aged 8 and the other is aged 2. The elder girl attends Junior School in the village and enjoys roller skating and playing tennis in her spare time; she is also a member of the local Brownies.
They have 2 cars and go to Church.
